thread.title: Leicester Fires Ranieri in Ugly End to Fairy Tale’s Sequel
thread.title_full: Leicester Fires Ranieri in Ugly End to Fairy Tale’s Sequel - WSJ

author: Joshua Robinson
title: Leicester Fires Ranieri in Ugly End to Fairy Tale’s Sequel
text:
LONDON—Even pulling off the greatest miracle in Premier League history couldn’t save Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri.

Nine months ago, his team overcame 5,000-to-1 odds to topple English soccer royalty and win its first championship in 132 years of trying. On Thursday night, with Leicester City locked in a battle for Premier League survival, the club dismissed him. The Foxes are currently in 17th place, one point removed from...
